    • Constructor Detail

      • Pawn

        public Pawn​(boolean isWhite,
            Tile tile)
        This class is uuses the Piece object to define how a Pawn behaves
        Parameters:
        isWhite - flag for white or black piece
        tile - represents tile object

    • Method Detail

      • isMoveValid

        public boolean isMoveValid​(Tile targetTile)
        This function is used to check if the player requested move is a valid operation. First it checks if a king is under check and if moving this piece jeapordizes its king, then uses the isValidTile function to check if the requested move is a valid move to make
        Overrides:
        isMoveValid in class Piece
        Parameters:
        targetTile - used to check if moving piece to targetTile is valid
        Returns:
        returns false whenever move is not valid, otherwise returns true

      • movePiece

        public void movePiece​(Tile targetTile)
        In the pawn implementation of movePiece, conditions for en passant and creating a tile that may be attacked under en passant are handled here.
        Overrides:
        movePiece in class Piece
        Parameters:
        targetTile - used in movePiece to determine where a piece should be moved

      • isValidTile

        public boolean isValidTile​(Tile current,
                           Tile target)
        This function checks if the target tile requested by player is a valid tile for a pawn to move to.
        Parameters:
        current - represents the current tile being checked by isValidTile
        target - represents the target tile being checked by isValidTile
        Returns:
        returns 1 if target is on a valid tile to move to, 0 if target is not on a valid tile to move to
